name: The Cute Cat - Puzzle Game
description:
The Cute Cat is a Physics Game made up of 24 levels. This cute kitty wants to play!
Take the ball to the cat to pass to the next level.
Click breakable objects to destroy them and get the ball to the cute cat, collect coins (maximum 3 for level), make movable objects fall to get to next level!

Can you solve all 24 puzzles winning 3 stars each level?
